Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 kuththuvilakku Eppozhudhum Erindhukondirukkumpadi Adharkaaga Idiththup Pizhindha Thelivaana Oliva Enneyai Isravel Puththirar Unnidaththil Konduvarumpadi Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyidu.

3 aasarippuk Koodaaraththil Saatchisannidhiyin Thiraikku Velippuramaaga Aaron Adhai Eppozhudhum Saayankaalam Thodangi Vidiyarkaalammattum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Eriyumpadi Etrakkadavan; Idhu Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Sellavendiya Niththiya Kattalai .
4 avan Eppozhudhum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Parisuththamaana Kuththuvilakkinmel Irukkira Vilakkugalai Eriya Vaikkakkadavan.
5 andriyum Nee Melliya Maavai Eduththu, Adhaip Pannirandu Appangalaaga Suduvaayaaga; Ovvoru Appam Marakkaalile Paththil Irandupangu Maavinaal Seyyappadavendum.
6 avaigalai Nee Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Parisuththamaana Mejaiyinmel Irandu Adukkaaga, Ovvoru Adukkil Avvaaru Appam Irukkumpadiyaaga Vaiththu,
7 ovvoru Adukkinidaththil Suththamaana Thoobavarkkam Podakkadavaai; Adhu Appaththodirundhu, Gnaabagakkuriyaagak Karththarukketra Thaganapaliyaayirukkum.
8 appaththai Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Isravel Puththirar Kaiyile Vaangi, Oivunaaldhorum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Adukkivaikkakkadavan.

9 adhu Aaronaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Serum; Adhaip Parisuththa Idaththile Pusikkakkadavargal; Niththiya Kattalaiyaagak Karththarukku Idappadum Thaganapaligalil Adhu Avanukku Magaa Parisuththamaayirukkum Endraar.

10 akkaalaththile Isravel Jaadhiyaana Sthreekkum Egipthiya Purushanukkum Pirandha Puththiranaagiya Oruvan Isravel Puththirarodekoodap Purappattu Vandhirundhaan; Ivanum Isravelanaagiya Oru Manidhanum Paalayaththile Sandaipanninaargal.

11 appozhudhu Isravel Jaadhiyaana Andha Sthreeyin Magan Karththarin Naamaththai Nindhiththu Dhooshiththaan. Avanai Moseyinidaththil Konduvandhaargal. Avan Thaayinper Selomidh; Aval Thaan Koththiraththaanaagiya Thipriyin Kumaaraththi.
12 karththarin Vaakkinaale Thangalukku Uththaravu Varumattum, Avanaik Kaavalpaduththinaargal .
13 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
14 dhooshiththavanaip Paalayaththukkup Purambe Kondupo; Kettavargal Ellaarum Thangal Kaigalai Avan Thalaiyinmel Vaippaargalaaga; Pinbu Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avanaik Kalleriyakkadavargal.
15 melum Nee Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Evanaagilum Than Dhevanaithdhooshiththaal, Avan Than Paavaththai Sumappaan.

16 karththarudaiya Naamaththai Nindhikkiravan Kolaiseyyappadavendum; Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avanaik Kalleriyavendum; Paradhesiyaanaalum Sudhesiyaanaalum Karththarin Naamaththai Dhooshikkiravan Kolaiseyyappadavendum .
17 oru Manidhanaik Kollugiravan Evano Avan Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
18 mirugaththaik Kondravan Mirugaththukku Mirugam Kodukkakkadavan.
19 oruvan Piranai Oonappaduththinaal, Avan Seydhapadiye Avanukkum Seyyappadakkadavadhu.
20 norukkudhalukku Norukkudhal, Kannukkuk Kan, Pallukkup Pal; Avan Oru Manidhanai Oonappaduththinadhupola Avanum Oonappaduththappadavendum.
21 mirugaththaik Kondravan Padhil Kodukkavendum; Manidhanaik Kondravano Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
22 ungalil Paradhesikkum Sudhesikkum Ore Nyaayam Irukkavendum; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Endru Sol Endraar.
23 appadiye, Dhooshiththavanaip Paalayaththukkup Purambe Kondupoi, Avanaik Kalleriyumpadi Mose Isravel Puththirarode Sonnaan; Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Seydhaargal.
